body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Henry Hernandez, and I'm from Quality Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Henry! My name is Lisa Allen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Lisa! Thank you for sharing your name. Can you provide me with your room number and reservation ID so I can assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my room number is two zero three and my reservation ID is seven eight nine four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Lisa. Just a couple more questions, if you don't mind. Could you please confirm your check-in date and the duration of your stay in spell-out numbers?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My check-in date was January third and I'm staying for four nights.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Lisa, for providing the details. I will look into the matter related to the bad smell in your room. Your feedback is important for us to maintain our high standards. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, Henry, I appreciate your help. I'm feeling happy with the service so far.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's my pleasure, Lisa. Thank you for your time and patience. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful stay at Quality Hotels.
